properties.areaDesc: Southeast Warren; Northern Warren; Northern Washington
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 5:17AM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
Some shallow cold air has moved into portions of eastern Warren
and northern Washington counties causing temperatures to fall into
the lower to mid 30s. Some pockets of freezing rain may occur on
untreated surfaces where temperatures have fallen to 32 degrees or
colder. Where temperatures remain above 32 degrees expect plain
rain to continue. The winds will be north to northeast at 5 to 15
mph. Light ice accretions are possible. Use caution if out on the
roads this morning.

NWSheadline: POCKETS OF FREEZING RAIN THIS MORNING
